trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays an image.
The Image class enables you to load the following image types: .bmp, .gif, .ico, .jpg, .png, .wdp, and .tiff.
trans-unit.target: 映像类使您能够加载以下图像类型︰.bmp、.gif、.ico、.jpg、.png、.wdp 和.tiff。

trans-unit.source: When displaying a multiframe image, only the first frame is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当显示一个多帧图像，只是第一个框会显示。

trans-unit.source: The animation of multiframe images is not supported by the Image control.
trans-unit.target: 图像控件不支持多帧图像的动画。

trans-unit.source: Until the image content is loaded, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> of the control will report as zero, because the image content is used to determine the final size and location of the control.
trans-unit.target: 直到加载的映像包内容，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>的控件将报告为零，因为映像内容用来确定的最终大小和位置的控件。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a fixed size control, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> and/or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> properties can be set.
trans-unit.target: 对于固定的大小控件，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>和/或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>属性可以进行设置。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, to preserve the media's aspect ratio, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> properties but not both.
trans-unit.target: 但是，若要保留媒体的纵横比，设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>属性但不是能同时。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref> class.
Arranges and sizes an image control.
trans-unit.target: 排列和大小的图像控件。

trans-unit.source: The size used to arrange the control.
The size of the control.
Gets or sets the base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>.
A base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>.
Occurs after the DPI of the screen on which the Image is displayed changes.
trans-unit.target: 在其的图像位于屏幕的 DPI 显示更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEvent"></xref> for when the DPI of the screen the Image is on changes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEvent"> </xref>的屏幕图像的 DPI 时更改。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Occurs when there is a failure in the image.
trans-unit.target: 当在映像中失败时发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image.ImageFailed"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
Updates the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize*> of the image.
This method is called by the parent <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> and is the first pass of layout.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由父<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>且布局的第一个过程。

trans-unit.source: The image will always return its natural size, if it fits within the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果它适合约束，图像将始终返回其原始大小。

trans-unit.source: If not, it will return as large a size as it can.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将返回的最大大小的方式。

trans-unit.source: The size that the image should not exceed.
The image's desired size.
Creates and returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>对象的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer?displayProperty=fullName>.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>.
Called when the DPI at which this Image is rendered changes.
trans-unit.target: 时调用此图像呈现更改 DPI。

trans-unit.source: The previous DPI scale setting
trans-unit.target: 以前的 DPI 缩放设置

trans-unit.source: The new DPI scale setting
trans-unit.target: 设置新的 DPI 缩放比例

trans-unit.source: Renders the contents of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>.
An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> used to render the control.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"></xref> for the image.
## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see the type.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 文本使用对于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅类型。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Values *imageUri* A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the image file.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 值*imageUri* A[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的图像文件。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|,
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|，

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>|
The source of the drawn image.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image.Source*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that describes how an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref> should be stretched to fill the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，描述如何<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>应拉伸以填充目标矩形。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> will cause your image to stretch to completely fill the output area.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>将导致您的映像以拉伸以完全填充输出区域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>

trans-unit.source: When the output area and the image have different aspect ratios, the image is distorted by this stretching.
trans-unit.target: 当输出区域和图像的纵横比时，就会因拉伸失真映像。

trans-unit.source: To make an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> preserve the aspect ratio of the image, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> (default) or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>保留图像的纵横比，将此属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>（默认值） 或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates how the image is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示如何将图像进行缩放。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"></xref> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image.Stretch*> dependency property.
To be added.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the current context.
